comment.author: 97609500@N00
comment._content: I'm not on top of British officers insignia; however, I believe that chevrons on the upper arm denote non-commissioned officers (eg. sergeants).

comment.author: 47908901@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/kensaviation] 
Hi Ken, thanks for taking the time to look at our photos and for pointing this out to us. You will see that we have made changes to the description.

comment.author: 47908901@N03
comment._content: Thanks to John at the Heugh Battery for providing us with extra information. Find out more about the Heugh Battery on their website www.heughbattery.com/ We would really like to know more about the people in this photo. If you think you know something then please get in touch.

comment._content: It's cool that you're making these photos available here.  Thanks!
